tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Pros : 
1. Experienced Doctor, Answers your all queries and doubts, never scare the patient.
2. Smiling Face.

Cons : 
1. She is very busy as deputed as HOD  in Columbia Asia  because  of that to connect her over phone is very tough, first you need to call hospital, they will connect you to her if required.

2. I suggest her name for consultation but not for delivery as she is too busy and cant give too much time to try for normal delivery .
As every girl is little scared of labour pain and want to opt C - section as painless option, Doctor tries to convince the pateint once or twice for normal else agreed for C-section.

3. She won't prefer Saturday and Sunday for deliveries.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I am totally happy and satisfied with Dr.Beena's treatment. I cannot say enough wonderful things about her. ***** ** **** * ***** ***** * ********* ****** *** ******** All I can say is I was so lucky to have found her. I only regret for not having seen or met her much before , I got to know about this amazing doctor through a friend of mine and I will strongly recommend all those with gynaec issues to meet Dr.Beena without any second thought or opinion. She will find a solution for you, a permanent solution. I can guarantee on that.  She never made me feel uncomfortable or bad for asking so many questions. Each time I see her, she has a smile on her face, no matter how big or complicated your problem is, she will make you feel at ease and give you the perfect treatment. I have always walked out from the clinic with great peace and contentment, thats how she makes you feel.  She is a best gyne I ever experienced. Before meeting Dr.Beena, I have consulted with many other gyne who are just professional with their patients. However, Dr. Beena is out of the world I would say. **** *** ***** Hats off to you Doctor... I would once  again recommend everyone to consult doctor Beena and get best advice all the time. God Bless you Doctor...

tags: None
review: She listened the problem patiently. Gone through all reports. She did a physical check tge explained what's issue, what yo be done. She is very calm and gave enough support.

tags: None
review:
Dr Beena does not give you the time of day which can be very disappointing for new mothers. I had to consult with Dr Beena as my previous consulting gynecologist left the hospital. Dr Beena is very brisk and curt and none of our sessions lasted more than 5 mins. Any follow up questions is given a standard response. At the time of birth, I did not have a say as to the type of birth. Worst still we did not receive any prior information about what a c-section entails. I had to do all my research on google. And after delivery too I had to google everything. I stopped visiting after the delivery however, unfortunately I developed infection at the site of sutures and had high fever. My wound opened up again. It took months of going to the hospital to get it dressed till it finally healed. 
That was very taxing especially if you have a newborn to look after and you are running on minimal sleep. 
We plan to have just one child. And I feel cheated that my only experience of pregnancy has not been a very happy one.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Beena Ma'am is very confident experienced doctor, *** ****** **** *********** ******** ** ***** *******, she has a very good approach to.go step by step for patients welfare. She was very helpful for me in my consultation pregnancy phase and delivery, never scares patients and take correct action. I am thankful to her.

tags: None
review:
An excellent doctor. I've visited Dr. Beena 3-4 times and every time I have come out with a sigh of relief. She listens patiently and always have a smile on her face.. very comforting. She does not rush into anything and Very calmly does the diagnosis.. her treatment worked really good for me.
After a long search found a very reliable doctor.
Thank you Dr. Beena

tags: None
review: Doctor was good. However for an aptt booked for 12 pm, got to see the doctor only by around 1 after mutliple follow ups with reception. Resulted in an hour of delay for a non critical issue. Hospital should have better way of tracking appointments and avoid over booking.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited beena for my pregnancy and she is friendly and nvr suggested any unneccassary tests and she supported me during my labour and eventhough its c section she showed me baby and advised me for early breastfeeding after 3hrs from c section.she helped me in fast recovery .Thanks beena for her support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr.Beena has been very patient and friendly and throughout my pregnancy took real good care and was always available over phone. Very compassionate.. She took extra care during my last few weeks of pregnancy when my BP levels were fluctuating. Highly recommend her for pregnancy and delivery related issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Caesarean Section (C Section),Pregnant Women Counseling,
review: Hi, I have been visiting Dr.Beena Jeysing for my pregnancy related appointments over the last few months and recently underwent a C-section surgery for delivery.. I was completely relaxed throughout the surgery. Dr.Beena took extra care when my BP levels were fluctuating in the last few days of pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Hi,
My experiences so far have been very good with Dr. Beena jeysingh. I had visited 2 more doctors which were very experienced and popular. But, only here i got the proper relief. I had small haematoma in early pregnancy. While others scared us, Dr. Beena very nicely explained all risks and positive factors too. Her treatment has been very helpful. In all other follow ups for any issue she provide treatment without scaring us. No unneccessary medication. To the point details.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Firstly I would like to thank the doctor for recognizing me after almost 6 yrs. I consulted her for my second pregnancy as I was unhappy with the doctor near my home. I felt really happy and comfortable with the warmth shown by Dr. Beena. Although it's little little far from electronic City I would like to visit Dr Beena as I am extremely satisfied with the way I am treated by her.

tags: None
review: Worst experience ever.. Dint even spent 1 min..instead of listening d problem Dr said u need to meet another physicians.. Den y should spend 500 rs to listen dat i need to meet other doctor. **** * **** *** ** ******* **** ******** She sent me and asked me to come after 10 days i dint understand for wat fun i went today

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: She is an excellent doctor...Talks to the point , does not prescribe unnecessary medicines. I have fibroid issue , my earlier gynac suggested me to get it removed through surgery but Dr Beena said there is no need for any surgery . She gave a genuine advise to me & I was completely relieved. I will recommend her for sure.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I went for my wife's pregnancy to Dr. Beena. She is a great doctor who knows what she is doing. My wife had low AFI during 37th week. She took a decision to induce labor pains.. She tried her best to deliver normally.  We were blessed with a healthy baby delivered normally.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Beena has been very supportive throughout my pregnancy. Her suggestion are bang on. I had faith in her and she didn’t let me down. She gave me  positive hopes throughout. She also handled my sisters critical pre- mature delivery , her timely decisions have blessed us with babies.  A big thanks to her!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: One of the Great gynecologist and a caring human being. Due to her continuous suggestions and support we were able to get our second baby c-section delivery. Never seen a friendly-behavior and exceptional question answering. Thanks so much for assistance.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ****** ******** ** ****** ** **** ****** ****** ** *** ******* **** ** ** ********** She was the first doctor we consulted during pregnancy. *** **** ** ** **** *** asked for more and more scans for the hospital, till I had to rush to a nearby doctor with a severe stomach pain to find out that the baby was not growing, and it was a miscarriage. **** ****** **** **** ***** **** ******* ***** *** ****** *** ***** ** ***** *** ******* *** *** **** *** *** *** *** ****** ** ** **** *** ******** **** Extremely upset and hurt due to this. We recommend that no one goes through a situation like this.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
*** ****** *** ** ********* ************** *** what good is that knowledge that you can't share with your patient and comfort them. Dr. Beena is extremely curt and to the point, spends less than a couple of minutes with every patient. Be prepared to Google everything to get your answers, because she is never interested in sharing anything. There is no transparency or information sharing. Every meeting with her leaves you dazed and confused. 
If you are the types who are ok doing whatever is recommended, she may be a great Doctor.
But, I repeat, if you are the kinds who would like to know more about the procedures etc., do not at all consider going to her. You'll leave highly unsatisfied.

tags: None
review: Doctor Beena Jeysingh is encouraging to go for normal delivery, at the same time is a great decision maker - analyses risk factors for delivery and communicates the same in very straightforward manner . She is very supportive we had a great journey with her during my pregnancy and delivery . Would surely recommend her :)

tags: None

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She's very polite and friendly,when I met her first time that time am 3 months pregnant now my baby will get 3 yrs till now am continuing with her, she's like goddess for me,she saved me and my baby from those critical situations, now am alive means that is because of her. she's not like other doctors, Beena Mam is something special to me, now am planning for 2nd baby,started treatment with her....

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I visited Dr.Beena Jeysingh in motherhood for my complete pregnancy care. She is very good in terms of listening to the problems we are facing *** ***** *** ***** ********** She made sure that we were aware of the smallest of small issue if any in the pregnancy and gave us right directions. I was made to induce pain and it was a normal delivery. Hence I highly recommend this doctor for all gynaec related issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited doctor for my pregnancy and she gave such positive guidance that helped ease all my pregnancy anxiety as it’s my first baby and the pandemic situation created lot of fear. However the responses and the care given by doctor eased most of it and I am very happy with her attitude and approach. Would definitely recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
She is warm , ‘to the point’ , experienced doctor.
I could trust her completely during my pregnancy and this is cos of her experience ,advises and friendliness. I really liked her style of work - very crisp. she is very fast and efficient * ****** *** ******* ***********I would recommend her by the way she handled my pregnancy, Thank you doctor!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Beena is compassionate, efficient and very thorough. She takes the time to listen to you and is completely non-judgemental. She also explains your problem in language you will understand and is adept at dealing with skittish people. I would highly recommend her services as you can be sure you're in knowing, safe hands.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: It's been my 3rd visit and so far it's been great. Dr Beena gives you a sense of confidence that all is well as she speaks so confidently and assures us that everything is fine. Hoping for this feeling to last for me as I'm going to visit her quite often now😊

I would  definitely recommend her .
